awards: semi-finalist for chemistry and general sciences Flemish olympiad
3rd place in the Belgian cyber security challenge

experience.comment: Involved with the groundwork for a next-generation customer portal with professional dashboards, dynamic news and document organisation. Full-stack development with Vue, ASP.NET and SQL.

Research project for analyzing, and predicting the power consumption on embedded devices. This research required knowledge of hardware, communication protocols, embedded software, and machine learning.
Individual project linked to honours programme. Data measurment and analysis of food temperature for premature babies. For data processing I used Seaborn, Pandas and Sklearn.
Responsible for integrating a form analyser and speech recognition system into a website for an insurance company. Mostly worked on the back-end using Azure service APIs.

academic.name: meme.ir
academic.description: A group project in which we finetuned a transformer model to predict a meme template given only the text. We achieved 70% top-1 accuracy on 100 templates.

academic.name: GNMX
academic.description: An interdisciplinary group project about computational biology. We developed a simulation and visualisation to investigate the genetic polymorphism phenomenon.

academic.name: O4 Compiler
academic.description: A fully fledged C to MIPS compiler using antlr4 and LLVM. There are several optimisation techniques which make the output quite optimised.

personal.name: PixelGuesser
personal.description: PixelGuesser is a party game where players have to guess the contents of a heavily pixelated image which slowly grows more detailed over time.

personal.name: Ray marching renderer
personal.description: Easy to use ray marching renderer using JSON for scene description. Many primitives, composables and textures are supported.

personal.name: C++ ini parser
personal.description: A Pythonic ini parser written in c++ using template hacking. The main goals are speed and ease of use. The ini file is read using a performant custom parser.
